About CCL Testing Plugins

A reactor pom for generating the CCL Testing plugins and depdendencies

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
CCL Testing Parent POM A POM that provides general-use artifacts for all projects in the CCL Testing group
File Transfer Utilities File transfer utilities to ease and abstract the work required to upload and download files via SFTP.
J4CCL A Java API for executing commands in a CCL prompt on a remote server.
SSH for J4CCL An implementation of J4CCL that uses SSH to execute its commands in a CCL session
JSch Utilities Utilities for using the JSch SSH and FTP libraries
CCL Testing Framework XML Schemas Schema files describing the XML used by the CCL Testing Framework
ccl-maven-plugin Maven Mojo A Maven plugin used to compile and test CCL code.
cerreal-maven-plugin Maven Mojo A plugin used to generate reports of test outcomes and code coverage by tests executed by the CCL Testing Framework and through the maven-ccl-plugin
Whitenoise Parent POM A POM that provides general-use artifacts for all whitenoise components
Whitenoise Data Data project for the Whitenoise static analysis engine
Whitenoise Data JDOM Extension Extensions of the Whitenoise data objects with JDOM extensions
Core Whitenoise Rules Common rules for Whitenoise analysis
Whitenoise Engine A static analysis engine for CCL
Maven Whitenoise Plugin A plugin to perform static analysis of CCL code
CDoc Parser A parser utility for parsing CDoc CCL documentation
Maven CDoc Plugin A plugin used to generate documentation reports about CCL source code
cclunit-archetype Archetype to set up an empty mavenized CCL project
cclunit-maven-settings-check-archetype Archetype to create a project for checking the maven setttings required for ccl-maven-plugin
